entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon with 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over eastern sections in the morning. Snow level rising to 1200 metres in the afternoon. High 7. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 3 April 2023
